title: Video: Lana Del Rey – Born To Die
body:
Thank god for that; **Lana Del Rey’s** new single _Born To Die_ finally has a proper video, rather than the cringeworthy cycled 30 second clip of her fondling a heavily tattooed hillbilly (I jest).

As previously reported, the official video does indeed feature Miss **Lizzy Grant** alongside a couple of exquisite fully grown tigers, whilst perched upon her throne in a lavishly decorated cathedral. Also, this video isn’t recommended for those with an unhealthy crush upon **Lana** (myself), as it shows her getting rather intimate with the aforementioned tattooed guy. As a video, it’s pretty cliched, but hey, what else were we expecting from the new princess of pop?

NB. 1) Is it just me or is Lana retardedly cross-eyed in the clip?

2) Those tigers must have been heavily sedated.
